hero-page.subtitle: Mu ne wani gidan bincike mai kirkira da ke Jamus, muna amfani da sabuwar fasahar zamani don ƙirƙira kayatattun wasannin bidiyo, apps, da abubuwan jin daɗin kafofin watsa labarai da kowa zai iya amfani da su

download-page.title: Zazzage
download-page.subtitle: Anan za ka iya zazzagewa da duba ayyukanmu

tiers.description11: Zurfin bincike a cikin kodinmu da zane
tiers.description12: Garkuwa kai tsaye da masu haɓaka mu
tiers.description13: Ana iya samunsa a duk duniya a YouTube
tiers.description21: Kyauta don wasa ba tare da ɓoyayyen farashi ba
tiers.description22: Yana goyan bayan tsoffin wayoyin hannu
tiers.description23: Wasan mai sauƙi don kowane lokaci da rana
tiers.description24: An gabatar da shi a cikin dev logs
tiers.description30: Akwai don Windows, Macos da Linux
tiers.description31: Rarraba ta hanyar Steam da Apple Store
tiers.buttontext3: Za a sanar da shi nan ba da daɗewa ba

faq.title: Tambayoyin da Ake Yawan Yi
faq.subtitle1: Ta yaya zan iya tuntuɓar goyon bayan abokin ciniki idan ina da tambaya ko matsala?
faq.description1: Za ka iya isa ga goyon bayan abokin ciniki ta hanyar aika da imel:
faq.subtitle2: Menene ya sa samfurinku ya bambanta daga sauran a kasuwa?
faq.description2: Samfurinmu ya bambanta kansa ta hanyar daidaitawar sa, dawwama, da sabbin siffofi. Muna ba da fifiko ga gamsuwa na mai amfani kuma muna ci gaba da ƙoƙari don wuce tsammanin a kowane fanni
faq.subtitle3: Ta yaya zan iya goyon bayan GiftBytesProductions?
faq.description3: Kana taimaka mana tuni ta hanyar gwada ayyukanmu da bada shawarar su. In ba haka ba, za ka iya yin rajista a tashar YouTube ɗinmu kuma ka shiga cikin jama'a. Don ƙarin goyon baya za ka iya kuma ba da gudummawa kai tsaye ta hanyar PayPal

feature-page.title: Siffofi
feature-page.subheader: Mun sadaukar da kai don ƙirƙira ingantattun abubuwan dijital da suke da sauƙin amfani, masu amfani da yawa, kuma an tsara su ta hanyar jama'armu. Anan akwai yadda muke kusanci ga ayyukanmu.

items.title: Maras laushi a duk na'urori
items.description: Kwarewarka bai kamata ta kasance daura da allo guda ɗaya ba. An tsara ayyukanmu sosai don gudu ba tare da matsala ba a kowace na'ura—daga kwamfyutocin tebur da na'urorin da ake ɗauka har zuwa wayoyin hannu da tsofaffi da sababbi.

items.title: Kirkira ba tare da farashi ba
items.description: Muna gaskata cewa manyan software da nishaɗi ya kamata su kasance ga kowa. Yawancin ayyukanmu kyauta ne gaba ɗaya, tare da software mai daraja da ake miƙa a farashi mai sauƙi, mai adalci.

items.title: Goyon bayan da jama'a suka jawo
items.description: Mu ba masu haɓakawa bane kawai; mu wani ɓangare ne na jama'a. Muna bunkasa a kan ra'ayoyinku kuma muna samar da goyon baya kai tsaye, mai amsa don tabbatar da cewa ayyukanmu sun ci gaba tare da bukatunku.

article.title: Sanarwar sabon aiki
article.description: Mun sanar da cewa sabon aikinmu zai zama wasan bidiyo na kwamfyutocin tebur kyauta wanda zai kasance a duk tsarin aiki da dandamali
article.author: Michael Schenk, Mai haɓaka

article.title: TouchSlider yana kan layi
article.description: Mun sanar da cewa wasan bidiyo na wayoyinmu TouchSlider yana nan don zazzagewa kyauta don IOS da Android
article.author: Michael Schenk, Mai haɓaka

article.title: Sabuwar gidan yanar gizo
article.description: Mun sanar da cewa gidan yanar gizonmu yana nan a kan layi kuma a bainar jama'a
article.author: Michael Schenk, Mai haɓaka

article.title: Sabon yanki
article.description: Mun sanar da cewa an yi rajistar yankinmu
article.author: Michael Schenk, Mai haɓaka

principles-page.title: Ka'idodinmu
principles-page.subheader: Waɗannan ƙa'idodi suna a tsakiyar duk abin da muke ginawa, daga farkon layin kodi har zuwa ƙarshen ƙwarewar mai amfani

items.title: Ana iya samu a ko'ina
items.description: Muna gaskata cewa babban software ya kamata ya yi aiki ga kowa, a kowace na'ura. An tsara ayyukanmu da kulawa don dacewa da dukkan dandamali da kuma samuwa daga tushe

items.title: Gogagge & Mai Aiki
items.description: Muna samar da cikakkun abubuwan da aka haɓaka sosai. Mayar da hankali kan tsabtacccen tsari da gwaje-gwaje masu tsanani yana tabbatar da cewa kowane samfurin yana da kwanciyar hankali, mai aiki, kuma a shirye don jin daɗi daga ranar farko

items.title: Tsarin mai sauƙin fahimta
items.description: Muna gaskata cewa software mai ƙarfi ba lallai bane ya zama mai rikitarwa. Sha'awarmu ta'a cikin ƙirƙira tsabtacccen, mai sauƙin fahimta wanda ke sa kowane garkuwa ya zama mai sauƙi da daɗi

items.title: An jawo shi ta hanyar kirkiro
items.description: Muna ginawa da tunanin nan gaba. Ta hanyar amfani da sabuwar software da fasahar kayan aiki, muna ƙirƙira samfurori masu hangen nesa tare da aiki mai ƙarfi, na zamani

items.title: Goyon bayan da aka sadaukar
items.description: Dangantakarmu ba ta ƙare a kan zazzagewa ba. Muna samar da goyon baya mai aminci, mai amsa kai tsaye daga tawagarmu don tabbatar da cewa kullum kana da babban gogewa tare da samfuranmu

items.title: Kwarewa mai kulawa
items.description: Muna gaskata cewa kyawawa yana cikin cikakkun bayanai. Daga farkon tunani zuwa layin kodi na ƙarshe, an tsara kowane ɓangare na aikinmu sosai kuma an aiwatar da shi daidai don samfurin ƙarshe ba tare da lahani ba

testimonials-page.title: Shawarwari
testimonials-page.subheader: Dubi abin da abokan ciniki, masu haɓakawa da masu gwaji suka fi so game da samfuranmu

testimonial.name: Nil Akash
testimonial.testimonial: Wasan mai kyau, kowa zai iya jin daɗin sa kuma ya yi wasa!

testimonial.name: Joy Roy
testimonial.occupation: Mai gwaji (ba a san shi ba)
testimonial.testimonial: Wannan wasan cikakke ne don wasa yayin tafiya ko a lokacin nishaɗi

testimonial.name: Anita Roy
testimonial.testimonial: Wasan mai daɗi da sauri! Hanyar 'matsa-don-juyawa' na da kaifin basira. Ina son gwada karya babban ƙimar da nake da shi a baya

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ina son yadda wannan samfurin yake da amfani da yawa! Ko da ina magance ayyukan aiki ko ina jin daɗin abubuwan da na fi so, yana daidaita da bukatuna masu canzawa ba tare da matsala ba. Tsarin sa mai sauƙin fahimta ya inganta tsarin yau da kullum, wanda ya sa ayyuka suka fi inganci da daɗi

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Ɗaya daga cikin manyan siffofin wannan samfurin shine goyon bayan abokin ciniki na musamman. A cikin kwarewata, ƙungiyar da ke bayan wannan samfurin tana da sauri don amsawa kuma tana da matuƙar taimako. Yana da kwanciyar hankali a san cewa suna tsaye da ƙarfi a bayan samfurin su

testimonial.name: Michael Schenk
testimonial.testimonial: Matakin sauƙi da dacewa da mai amfani a cikin wannan samfurin ya sauƙaƙe rayuwata sosai. Ina gode wa masu ƙirƙira don samar da mafita wanda ba wai kawai ya cika, amma ya wuce tsammanin masu amfani ba
